Class WordleModel

java.lang.Object
WordleModel
public class WordleModel
extends java.lang.Object
The WordleModel class contains methods to access and update tables in an SQL database that contains words and user information
Author:
Nathaniel Narunatvanich

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) static java.lang.String DATABASE_URL  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    WordleModel()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.util.List<java.lang.String> accessUser​(java.lang.String username)
    Method that creates a list to store the information of a specified user in SQL table
    static void addDailyScore​(java.lang.String username, int score, java.lang.String date)
    Method that sends query to SQL database to append daily score entries to a table with a specified userID, dailyScore value, and the current date
    static void calculateUserStats​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> list, int score, boolean winStreak)
    Method that calculates the new user information based on their performance on the current day's Wordle.
    static boolean canPlayWordle​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String date)
    Method that checks if the specified user exists in the SQL table, and if they have played the Wordle for the specified date
    static boolean checkForPlayed​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String date)
    Method that checks the SQL table to see if the specified user has played on the specified day to prevent multiple plays per day per user
    static boolean checkForUser​(java.lang.String username)
    Method that checks if a userID already exists in the SQL table
    static boolean checkWordValidity​(java.lang.String guess)
    Method that checks if the user inputted word is a valid word to run through the Wordle game by checking if the input exists in a word table in SQL database
    static void createUser​(java.lang.String username)
    Method that creates a new user entry in the SQL table
    static void deleteWordsFromDatabase​(java.lang.String wordToDelete)
    Method that removes the entries of the 5 words pulled from the SQL table to ensure that words cannot be reused on different days
    static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTopFiveAllTimeLeaderboard()
    Method that returns a List of entries in an SQL table with the highest totalScore values for all users
    static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTopFiveLeaderboard​(java.lang.String date)
    Method that returns a List of entries in an SQL table with the highest dailyScore values for the specified date
    static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUserLeaderboard​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String date)
    Method that creates a list of the current user's daily score and the current date
    static java.util.List<java.lang.String> grab2HardWords()
    Method that creates a list to store 2 words and their difficulties pulled from the SQL table
    static java.util.List<java.lang.String> grab3EasyWords()
    Method that creates a list to store 3 words and their difficulties pulled from the SQL table
    static java.util.List<java.lang.String> grab5Words()
    Method that appends all the values of the 3 easy words and 2 hard words pulled from the database to one List object to return to the Server object.
    static void updateUser​(java.lang.String username, int score, int rounds, int winStreak)
    Method that updates the user information via SQL query using the specified userID, totalScore, totalRoundsPlayed, and winStreak

  • Constructor Details

    • WordleModel

      public WordleModel()

  • Method Details

    • grab5Words

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> grab5Words()
      Method that appends all the values of the 3 easy words and 2 hard words pulled from the database to one List object to return to the Server object. This method also removes the pulled words from the database to prevent repeated words in the Wordle Tournament.
      Returns:
      list of the 5 words pulled from the database and their difficulties

    • grab3EasyWords

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> grab3EasyWords()
      Method that creates a list to store 3 words and their difficulties pulled from the SQL table
      Returns:
      List object that alternates between the words and their difficulties

    • grab2HardWords

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> grab2HardWords()
      Method that creates a list to store 2 words and their difficulties pulled from the SQL table
      Returns:
      List object that alternates between the words and their difficulties

    • deleteWordsFromDatabase

      public static void deleteWordsFromDatabase​(java.lang.String wordToDelete)
      Method that removes the entries of the 5 words pulled from the SQL table to ensure that words cannot be reused on different days
      Parameters:
      wordToDelete - word to be deleted from the SQL table

    • getTopFiveLeaderboard

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTopFiveLeaderboard​(java.lang.String date)
      Method that returns a List of entries in an SQL table with the highest dailyScore values for the specified date
      Parameters:
      date - a String of the current date "(MM/DD/YYYY)"
      Returns:
      List object that alternates between userID, dailyScore, and date for the 5 entries with the largest dailyScore values

    • getTopFiveAllTimeLeaderboard

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTopFiveAllTimeLeaderboard()
      Method that returns a List of entries in an SQL table with the highest totalScore values for all users
      Returns:
      List object that alternates between userID and totalScore for the 5 entries with the largest totalScore values

    • getUserLeaderboard

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUserLeaderboard​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String date)
      Method that creates a list of the current user's daily score and the current date
      Parameters:
      username - String of the user's unique ID
      date - String of the current day ("MM/DD/YYYY")
      Returns:
      List object that alternates between userID, dailyScore, and date

    • checkForUser

      public static boolean checkForUser​(java.lang.String username)
      Method that checks if a userID already exists in the SQL table
      Parameters:
      username - String of the specified userID
      Returns:
      true if the specified user exists in the SQL table, false if the user does not exist

    • createUser

      public static void createUser​(java.lang.String username)
      Method that creates a new user entry in the SQL table
      Parameters:
      username - String that will be used as the unique userID of the user

    • checkForPlayed

      public static boolean checkForPlayed​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String date)
      Method that checks the SQL table to see if the specified user has played on the specified day to prevent multiple plays per day per user
      Parameters:
      username - String of specified userID to use in SQL query
      date - String of date to use in SQL query
      Returns:
      true if userID has played that day, false if the user as not played for that day

    • canPlayWordle

      public static boolean canPlayWordle​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String date)
      Method that checks if the specified user exists in the SQL table, and if they have played the Wordle for the specified date
      Parameters:
      username - String for the specified userID
      date - String for the specified date
      Returns:
      true if user is able to play the Wordle, false if the user has already played the Wordle

    • checkWordValidity

      public static boolean checkWordValidity​(java.lang.String guess)
      Method that checks if the user inputted word is a valid word to run through the Wordle game by checking if the input exists in a word table in SQL database
      Parameters:
      guess - String of 5 letter word user guessed in Wordle game
      Returns:
      true if word exists in table and is a valid word, false if word is not a valid word

    • addDailyScore

      public static void addDailyScore​(java.lang.String username, int score, java.lang.String date)
      Method that sends query to SQL database to append daily score entries to a table with a specified userID, dailyScore value, and the current date
      Parameters:
      username - String of userID
      score - int of dailyScore value
      date - String of current date ("MM/DD/YYYY")

    • accessUser

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> accessUser​(java.lang.String username)
      Method that creates a list to store the information of a specified user in SQL table
      Parameters:
      username - String of the userID used to call information from SQL table
      Returns:
      List object that alternates between userID, totalScore, totalRoundsPlayed, and winStreak

    • updateUser

      public static void updateUser​(java.lang.String username, int score, int rounds, int winStreak)
      Method that updates the user information via SQL query using the specified userID, totalScore, totalRoundsPlayed, and winStreak
      Parameters:
      username - String for userID
      score - int for totalScore
      rounds - int for totalRoundsPlayed
      winStreak - int for winStreak

    • calculateUserStats

      public static void calculateUserStats​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> list, int score, boolean winStreak)
      Method that calculates the new user information based on their performance on the current day's Wordle. The totalScore, totalRoundsPlayed, and winStreak numbers will be changed in the SQL table using these calculations
      Parameters:
      list - List of the current user statistics
      score - int of score for the day
      winStreak - boolean if the user continued their win streak for the day
